text: Zhi wei tamen pohuai mengyue, wo qi juele tamen, bing shi tamen de xin bian cheng jianying de; tamen cuangai jing wen, bing paoqi ziji suo shou de yibufen quan jie. Chu tamen zhong de shaoshu ren wai, ni changchang fa jian tamen de jianzha, gu ni dang raoshu tamen, yuanliang tamen. Zhenzhu que shi xi'ai xingshan zhe de
